video.title: Burn Notice
video.synopsis: Stripped of his identity, blackballed government spy Michael Westen tries to uncover who burned him while helping ordinary people with big problems.

episodes.synopsis: A covert operative receives a burn notice, which is effectively a death sentence for a spy.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Michael's mother has some information on the men who may have ordered his burn notice.
episodes.title: Identity

episodes.synopsis: Michael protects a single mom from a drug trafficker who wants to prevent her from testifying against him.
episodes.title: Fight or Flight

episodes.synopsis: Michael dodges assassination attempts by a Czech assassin from his past.
episodes.title: Old Friends

episodes.synopsis: After they threaten an airport supervisor, Michael infiltrates a family of gunrunners in order to scare them off.
episodes.title: Family Business

episodes.synopsis: Michael discovers a surprise aboard a boat he repossessed from Jamaican gangsters.
episodes.title: Unpaid Debts

episodes.synopsis: Michael accepts a job protecting a convenience-store owner from the extortion of a local crime boss.
episodes.title: Broken Rules

episodes.synopsis: Michael gains access to the man behind his burn notice.
episodes.title: Wanted Man

episodes.synopsis: Michael considers taking a meeting with someone who may be able to revoke his burn notice.
episodes.title: Hard Bargain

episodes.synopsis: Michael finds out that he has been played by a female assassin.
episodes.title: False Flag

episodes.synopsis: Michael meets with Cowan, only to find that the people behind his burn notice have big plans in store for him. Part 1 of 2.
episodes.title: Loose Ends: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Michael meets with Cowan, only to find that the people behind his burn notice have big plans in store for him. Part 2 of 2.
episodes.title: Loose Ends: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: To save his client's kidnapped wife and daughter, Michael must help steal some highly secure data from a team of ruthless mercenaries.
episodes.title: Breaking and Entering

episodes.synopsis: Michael helps a female client being stalked by an obsessed cartel soldier by turning the soldier's own organization against him.
episodes.title: Turn and Burn

episodes.synopsis: To save his client, Michael pretends to be the perfect mark for a con artist -- then pulls a con of his own.
episodes.title: Trust Me

episodes.synopsis: To find the location of a client's captive sister, Michael must pose as a friendly cellmate to a human smuggler.
episodes.title: Comrades

episodes.synopsis: When his client can't back out of a crime ring, Michael must join the planning for a jewelry heist and destroy the group from within.
episodes.title: Scatter Point

episodes.synopsis: In order to catch an embezzler from a hip-hop mogul's charity, Michael must convince the thief to steal a larger amount.
episodes.title: Bad Blood

episodes.synopsis: To find some stolen cargo, Michael tricks a group of modern-day pirates to commit another heist.
episodes.title: Rough Seas

episodes.synopsis: Michael is approached by a former operator who uses his spy skills to make a living doing odd jobs like Michael.
episodes.title: Double Booked

episodes.synopsis: When a client is being forced into a kidnapping scheme, Michael must pose as a security consultant.
episodes.title: Good Soldier

episodes.synopsis: Having narrowly escaped death, Michael decides to help a desperate father recover money from a medical scam artist.
episodes.title: Do No Harm

episodes.synopsis: Michael, Fiona and Sam pose as a gang of ruthless car thieves to stop a thug who is threatening a local high school football star.
episodes.title: Hot Spot

episodes.synopsis: Michael poses as a corporate security specialist to help a wealthy art dealer track down a hacker in the company.
episodes.title: Seek and Destroy

episodes.synopsis: Jason Bly, a federal agent who has a knack for giving Michael trouble, returns to Miami to force Michael to hand over some blackmail materials.
episodes.title: Bad Breaks

episodes.synopsis: Michael takes on a sympathy case for a Haitian man whose daughter was murdered by a corrupt government official, whom he believes is hiding in Miami.
episodes.title: Truth and Reconciliation

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious woman from Michael's past shows up at his loft with a plea: Help her retrieve her kidnapped son from a black market trader.
episodes.title: Sins of Omission

episodes.synopsis: In the explosive season finale, Michael learns some surprising facts about Victor's past and is forced to take on Carla in a final showdown.
episodes.title: Lesser Evil

episodes.synopsis: Michael emerges free from interference by the organization that burned him. He isn't under their protection either, and is under police investigation.
episodes.title: Friends and Family

episodes.synopsis: Michael faces a new foe in Detective Paxson, who is getting a warrant after having tracked down explosives that Michael has been hiding in storage.
episodes.title: Question and Answer

episodes.synopsis: Arms trader Brennen returns and kidnaps Nate, forcing Michael to help him pull off an elaborate heist. Michael must also contend with Paxson.
episodes.title: End Run

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to get the Miami police off his back, Michael takes it upon himself to deal with one of the city's most wanted criminals.
episodes.title: Fearless Leader

episodes.synopsis: Michael meets a paranoid mathematician who enlists his help.
episodes.title: Signals and Codes

episodes.synopsis: When Michael hears about an operative from his past who is hunting him, he turns to Beck, a prominent member of Miami's underworld, for help.
episodes.title: The Hunter

episodes.synopsis: Michael, Sam and Fiona help a young boy whose family is being terrorized by his abusive and powerful stepfather.
episodes.title: Shot in the Dark

episodes.synopsis: Barry enlists Michael's help in tracking down his money-laundering client list, which has been stolen by a vicious thief.
episodes.title: Friends Like These

episodes.synopsis: A dangerous man from Fiona's past resurfaces in Miami after years of hiding, with deadly intentions.
episodes.title: Long Way Back

episodes.synopsis: When a recently widowed woman hires Michael and Fiona to get her away from a group of violent con men, Michael turns to Madeline for help.
episodes.title: A Dark Road

episodes.synopsis: When Sam gets an unexpected visit from a old buddy asking for help, Michael must infiltrate a protected urban barrio and hunt down a child predator.
episodes.title: Friendly Fire

episodes.synopsis: Michael is caught off guard by a visit from his drug-dealing neighbor Sugar. But to Michael's surprise, Sugar isn't looking for trouble.
episodes.title: Noble Causes

episodes.synopsis: Michael ends up in hot water when the black ops sociopath he's been dealing with asks him to steal sensitive flight information.
episodes.title: Enemies Closer

episodes.synopsis: Sam convinces Michael to investigate a robbery at a chic fashion house, but they quickly realize the world of design isn't always pretty.
episodes.title: Partners in Crime

episodes.synopsis: Fiona seems to get more than she bargained for when she gets involved with a paranoid kidnapper, only to discover that he's more than he appears.
episodes.title: Good Intentions

episodes.synopsis: Michael's worst fears come to life when a terrorist is unleashed on Miami, threatening to detonate a bomb if Michael doesn't give him what he wants.
episodes.title: Devil You Know

episodes.synopsis: Michael helps Fiona and Sam protect a lawyer against the city's most dangerous biker gang.
episodes.title: Friends and Enemies

episodes.synopsis: Michael meets Jesse, a recently burned counterintelligence agent looking for Michael's help.
episodes.title: Fast Friends

episodes.synopsis: While investigating an underground artillery operation at the Port of Miami, Michael and Jesse come across a port worker being threatened by mobsters.
episodes.title: Made Man

episodes.synopsis: The stakes become higher than expected when Michael and Sam are inadvertently dragged into a hostage situation at a local bank.
episodes.title: Breach of Faith

episodes.synopsis: A reluctant doctor turns to Michael for help when a group of vicious drug dealers terrorize his neighborhood clinic.
episodes.title: Neighborhood Watch

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Jesse interrogate a captured contract killer in order to find out who ordered a recent assassination.
episodes.title: Entry Point

episodes.synopsis: Michael helps an ex-CIA operative who has become a target of Russian spies.
episodes.title: Past and Future Tense

episodes.synopsis: Michael, Sam and Jesse must try to rescue Fiona when their plan to protect a wealthy business bigwig at his house party go horribly awry.
episodes.title: Where There's Smoke

episodes.synopsis: Michael impersonates a hitman in order to protect the target, who is a crucial witness to criminal activity.
episodes.title: Center of the Storm

episodes.synopsis: Michael infiltrates a high-security prison in order to protect an inmate (a good friend of Sam's) who is marked for death by a fellow prisoner.
episodes.title: Hard Times

episodes.synopsis: Michael and his team come to the aid of a woman who has had her entire life savings wiped out by a sleazy womanizer.
episodes.title: Blind Spot

episodes.synopsis: Michael helps a criminal defense attorney rescue his daughter after she is kidnapped by one of his clients.
episodes.title: Guilty as Charged

episodes.synopsis: When a vengeful lawyer hires a paranoid bombmaker to kill off members of a local gang, Michael is forced to intervene before innocent lives are lost.
episodes.title: Eyes Open

episodes.synopsis: Michael finds himself trapped when a malicious thief returns to Miami with a plan to steal a chemical weapon from Venezuelan revolutionaries.
episodes.title: Hot Property

episodes.synopsis: When Nate gets in over his head tracking down a drug kingpin's merchandise, Michael brings back an old alias to save his brother's life.
episodes.title: Brotherly Love

episodes.synopsis: When Sam's old friend goes missing and is branded a dirty cop, Michael and Sam spearhead an investigation in order to clear his name.
episodes.title: Dead or Alive

episodes.synopsis: Michael's ruthless enemy Brennan vows to release a valuable piece of data if Michael doesn't carry out a specific task: killing off government agents.
episodes.title: Out of the Fire

episodes.synopsis: Michael's world collapses when a tactical assault team comes after him and his loved ones. Michael has to do everything in his power to hold them off.
episodes.title: Last Stand

episodes.synopsis: Before man of mystery Sam Axe teamed up with Michael and Fiona, he was a U.S. Navy SEAL and a respected naval commander.
episodes.title: Burn Notice: The Fall of Sam Axe

episodes.synopsis: Although still burned, Michael works alongside his old agency to bring down the people who burned him, a mission that leads them to Venezuela.
episodes.title: Company Man

episodes.synopsis: Michael has to balance his new agency duties and helping a woman recover her cousin, who is one of many being trafficked into the U.S. by the Yakuza.
episodes.title: Bloodlines

episodes.synopsis: Michael's brother, Nate, returns to Miami and recruits him to help take down a loan shark that's been harassing an old friend's widow.
episodes.title: Mind Games

episodes.synopsis: When Barry's brother is framed for a server heist by a ruthless hacker, the team tries to track down her super-computer before it's too late.
episodes.title: No Good Deed

episodes.synopsis: Michael plays a key role in a CIA murder investigation. Meanwhile, the team helps a former army sniper who reminds them of Michael.
episodes.title: Square One

episodes.synopsis: Michael must help the CIA retrieve a weapon from a violent Serbian mob. As part of the plan, Sam goes undercover with a heroin dealer.
episodes.title: Enemy of My Enemy

episodes.synopsis: When a woman's ex-husband takes their ailing son to an armed compound, Michael and Sam vow to bring her boy back to her.
episodes.title: Besieged

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Jesse join Agent Pearce for a CIA extraction mission in the Caribbean, but an army of mercenaries makes it impossible for them to leave.
episodes.title: Hard Out

episodes.synopsis: Fiona and Jesse take a surveillance job for a powerful pharmaceuticals magnate, while Michael and Sam interrogate a bomb maker.
episodes.title: Eye for an Eye

episodes.synopsis: Michael goes undercover with a group of hijackers to assist Jesse with a security job, but the hijackers start taking hostages at the airport.
episodes.title: Army of One

episodes.synopsis: In order to extract a dangerous bio-weapons specialist, Michael and Fiona go undercover as a rich married couple at a South American resort.
episodes.title: Better Halves

episodes.synopsis: With all evidence pointing to him, Michael must perform a desperate act in order to clear his name as Max's murderer.
episodes.title: Dead to Rights

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Fiona head to Puerto Rico to abduct a financial hacker, but the hacker has some dangerous enemies waiting for him in Miami.
episodes.title: Damned If You Do

episodes.synopsis: When gang warfare claims the life of one of Michael's childhood friends, he teams up with the victim's brother to entrap the gang in a weapons scheme.
episodes.title: Breaking Point

episodes.synopsis: Michael runs point on a CIA rescue mission involving a scientist kidnapped by an African warlord. Meanwhile, Sam and Jesse go undercover.
episodes.title: Necessary Evil

episodes.synopsis: Sam has a reunion with Beatriz, whose articles have made her the target of a murderous Russian spy. Michael must trust Anson to track the Russian.
episodes.title: Depth Perception

episodes.synopsis: Michael needs Pearce's help to get in touch with a prisoner from his past who has information on Anson.
episodes.title: Acceptable Loss

episodes.synopsis: Pearce puts Michael in charge of his biggest CIA mission yet.
episodes.title: Fail Safe

episodes.synopsis: Racing against the clock, Michael hunts Anson through the streets of Miami. Meanwhile, Fiona is taken into federal custody and interrogated.
episodes.title: Scorched Earth

episodes.synopsis: After the CIA denies his request to see Fiona, Michael offers to help take down a drug cartel in return for visitation privileges.
episodes.title: Mixed Messages

episodes.synopsis: Pearce enlists Michael's help in seeking revenge against her fiancé's killer. But things get complicated when they discover the man is a CIA asset.
episodes.title: Last Rites

episodes.synopsis: Michael, Sam and Jesse head to the Everglades to track a lead, but things go horribly wrong when Sam is kidnapped.
episodes.title: Under the Gun

episodes.synopsis: Michael's mentor, Tom Card, offers Fiona a chance to leave prison and avoid extradition in exchange for becoming a CIA asset.
episodes.title: Split Decision

episodes.synopsis: As Michael gets a lead on Anson, an assassin pins down Sam and Barry. Meanwhile, an MI-6 agent tries to prevent Fiona's release from prison.
episodes.title: Shock Wave

episodes.synopsis: Sam tries to help his girlfriend's son, who's indebted to a loan shark. Meanwhile, Michael and Fiona must pick up the pieces from their last mission.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: To help the FBI nail a Boston mobster, Michael gets himself arrested. Elsewhere, Jesse and Pearce run into trouble while investigating a gun sale.
episodes.title: Unchained

episodes.synopsis: Fiona helps a CIA asset being targeted by a black-market businessman. Elsewhere, Sam and Jesse infiltrate a mercenary training camp to catch a sniper.
episodes.title: Official Business

episodes.synopsis: The team runs into trouble as they head to Panama to track down an assassin. Meanwhile, Madeline presses Card for answers.
episodes.title: Desperate Times

episodes.synopsis: The gang cooks up a hijacking scheme to escape from Panama, while Michael tries to elude a Panamanian drug runner.
episodes.title: Desperate Measures

episodes.synopsis: An ex-inmate asks Fiona for help taking on a corrupt detective. Elsewhere, Michael teams with a former adversary to take down an even bigger enemy.
episodes.title: Means & Ends

episodes.synopsis: Michael is accused of a crime at a hotel. Elsewhere, Olivia questions Sam in an attempt to get to Michael.
episodes.title: Over the Line

episodes.synopsis: To rescue an inept smuggler, Michael arranges to be captured by a Syrian intelligence officer.
episodes.title: Down & Out

episodes.synopsis: Michael's plan to sell a valuable piece of technology lands Sam in the cross fire when the deal goes sour. Elsewhere, Madeline asks Barry for a favor.
episodes.title: Best Laid Plans

episodes.synopsis: Survival becomes a challenge as Michael hides in a warehouse after being caught in the middle of a smuggler's attempt to get revenge on an ex-client.
episodes.title: Odd Man Out

episodes.synopsis: Sam is shot and Jesse is captured when the gang is ambushed while attempting to escape.
episodes.title: You Can Run...

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, a group of assassins targets the gang, forcing Michael to go on the offensive.
episodes.title: Game Change

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of a new deal with the CIA, Michael is under deep cover in the Dominican Republic, where he's tasked with infiltrating a terrorist group.
episodes.title: New Deal

episodes.synopsis: Michael returns to Miami to hunt down a sociopath who's trying to blow his cover. But there's a caveat: Michael isn't allowed to contact his friends.
episodes.title: Forget Me Not

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Jesse travel to the Dominican Republic after Michael asks for their help with a high-stakes trade involving an international bomber.
episodes.title: Down Range

episodes.synopsis: As Michael tries to learn more about Burke's underground network, Fiona and Madeline are sent to break a prisoner out of a Russian black site in Cuba.
episodes.title: Brothers in Arms

episodes.synopsis: To escape from Cuba, Michael joins forces with a former Russian operative working in Burke's organization.
episodes.title: Exit Plan

episodes.synopsis: Michael wrestles with memories and old feelings while working with Fiona to steal information from a programming syndicate for Sonya.
episodes.title: All or Nothing

episodes.synopsis: Michael is drugged by the leader of the organization that he's trying to dismantle, putting him at risk of revealing dangerous secrets.
episodes.title: Psychological Warfare

episodes.synopsis: At the behest of the organization he's been working to infiltrate, Michael goes after a ruthless drug smuggler in the Dominican Republic.
episodes.title: Nature of the Beast

episodes.synopsis: When Libyan extremists poison a Middle Eastern diplomat, Michael and the team rush to obtain the antidote from the manufacturer's lab.
episodes.title: Bitter Pill

episodes.synopsis: When a longtime friend starts digging up secrets that could expose Michael's cover, he must decide how far he'll go to protect the mission.
episodes.title: Things Unseen

episodes.synopsis: As Michael becomes ever-more conflicted about his mission, he travels to Mexico with Sonya to help James with an important job.
episodes.title: Tipping Point

episodes.synopsis: Fiona, Sam and Jesse fear that Michael may be in too deep after he's forced to expose his true identity to James and Sonya.
episodes.title: Sea Change

episodes.synopsis: Still at odds with the CIA and unable to forgive himself for betraying his team, Michael struggles to regain their trust to finish what he started.
episodes.title: Reckoning
